page.title: 15A popular game by J.Taylor
page.content: My favourite game is{ONE,TWO,THREE IN This is a game where you need a lot of people to play, like 10 or 12, and you play it outside.You pick one person who is going to be on. Then you pick a place where you all can stay but the person who is on cannot stay in there. The person who is on counts to 100 and while he or she is counting everyone else gets out of the place and they quickly hide. The person who is on has to find those people who are hiding.The first person to be caught is on the next time the game is played.
